product_name: The North Face Base Camp Roll Kit
long_description: Tote small essentails or toiletries in The North Face Base Camp Roll Kit to minimize bulk while traveling. When you reach your destination, you can hang it by the hook closure for easy access. Roll-up kit is expandable to hold a lot or just a little. Internal zippered and sleeve pockets offer quick organization and easy access while hanging or laying flat. The North Face Base Camp Roll Kit features a hook closure that doubles as hanging loop.
short_description: Tote small essentails or toiletries in The North Face Base Camp Roll Kit to minimize bulk while traveling. When you reach your destination, you can hang it by the hook closure for easy access.
